long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover and Buy Products on Facebook and Youtube Live Sales.

Genie24 makes it super easy for you to enjoy buying from live sellers like boutiques and online brands on Facebook live and Youtube live.

When you watch a live stream from a Genie24 live seller, you'll automatically see popups of the products they are selling so that it's easy for you to buy them and check out.

Live sellers put on great deals for a limited time when they are live, with a limited number of products. You don't want to miss out on those products so the easiest way to make sure you get those exclusive deals is to use Genie24.

Just install it on your chrome browser and let Genie24 do its magic.
